thread.section_title: FreedomVoice Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FreedomVoice | www.freedomvoice.com | 2 of 20
thread.title: HealthyDoc

author: HealthyDoc
title: HealthyDoc
text: At first I was really excited about the features: auto-attendant, smart forwarding rules, free extensions, free fax. But then things weren't working like they were supposed to: dropped calls, bad call quality, calls not routing properly and small limits on fax size. The company is very cool in concept but needs to improve the quality of their technology. I hope they get it together.
